actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to transfer responsibility for establishing standards and regulations pertaining to the control and abatement of aircraft noise from the Federal Aviation Administration to the Environmental Protection Agency.

summary.text: Aircraft Noise Control Amendments Act - Grants to the Environmental Protection Agency responsibility under the Federal Aviation Act for the establishment, after consultation with the Secretary of Transportation and the Federal Aviation Administration, of: (1) standards for the measurement of aircraft noise and sonic boom; and (2) regulations to provide such control and abatement of aircraft noise and sonic boom as EPA determines is necessary to protect the public health and welfare.

titles.title: A bill to transfer responsibility for establishing standards and regulations pertaining to the control and abatement of aircraft noise from the Federal Aviation Administration to the Environmental Protection Agency.
